title: (2550) Cadaval - 20 Rua das Castanholas
description: Nice launderette, free WiFi available. Nearby is a park with playground.

title: (2550-368) DaMinhaCasa Park - Cadaval - Rua fonte do Telheiro - Murteira
title_short: (2550-368) DaMinhaCasa Park - Cadaval - Rua fonte do Telheiro - Murteira
description: Country house with a beautiful view of the Montejunto mountain, offers parking for motorhomes, caravans and tents. Allows contact with nature: space with animals such as chickens and goats. Possibility to purchase homemade products such as cheese, eggs and bread. Our motto is: "Happiness is in the simple things"

title: (2540) Bombarral -
description: (ASA de BOMBARRAL) - free service area with overnight parking for ten motorhomes (some shadows, others not) about 200 m behind the hypermarket Modelo/Continente. Quiet and safe place, with 250 m flat pedestrian access to city center (crossing railway line) and traditional grossery and municipal market. Several supermarkets around, municipal forest in city, tourist office, railway station (line to Lisboa), municipal museum, library and theater; kart race. In surrounding, ex-libris garden “Jardim Buddha Éden", in Quinta dos Louridos farm (to which there is also pedestrian access from parking through two trails and agricultural fields. Several wine farms (Quintas dos Louridos, do Sanguinhal, das Cerejeiras and da Granja) where taste is possible. Feel at home and in a family atmosphere!...

title: (2540) Carvalhal - Unnamed Road
description: Good point parking gardens, wineries, Buddhas, terracotta warriors and wine sales

title: (2540) Carvalhal - Rua Senhor Jesus
description: Nice picnic spot by a church, just a little further down the road opposite a restaurant at a bend there is a much larger area with many tables where an overnight seems possible and lots of shade.

title: (2580) Alenquer - 14 Rua Principal
description: Small water fountain in the city. easy access. good jet for filling water hacks.

title: (2550) - Unnamed Road
description: End of the world for autonomous motorhomes, parking in the mountains, 2 tracks of 3 km of nature walk. Close to a campsite (not closed in winter). Windmills. Wind turbines on the horizon. Few telephone network, wifi at the campsite and free wifi Cadaval and office which serves as a tourist office.

title: (2550) Ariero - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful panoramic views, 600m up, the highest point nearby by far, you can enjoy the sunrise and sunset next to the 18th century chapel, an old point of pilgrimage that still attracts visitors today. It's right next to a vast amount of antennas (ref highest point for miles), doesn't bother us but It'd look nicer without them. Opportunity to hike or bike to surrounding areas, no shade or services, easy road access, lots of space with relatively flat parking.

name: Parque de Campismo Rural da Serra de Montejunto
title: (2580) Parque de Campismo Rural da Serra de Montejunto
title_short: (2580) Parque de Campismo Rural da Serra de Montejunto
description: Very nice camping place in nature. We must arrive till 5 PM. I spent just one day because i was finishing my August holidays. I will return as soon as possible.

title_short: (2565-587) Outeiro da Cabeça - 1 Rua do Pavilhão Gimnodesportivo

title: (2580 041) Abrigada - VA Rua da Liberdade

title: (2510) Óbidos - Rua Número 2

title: (2510) Óbidos - 2 Rua do Ginásio

title: (2510) Óbidos - 6 Estrada Real
description: Washing Machine and Gas Station Service, very practical if you are in the Parking in front.

title: () Óbidos - N114

title: (2510-089) Óbidos - 9 N114

title: (2510) Óbidos - 11 Rua das Lezirias
description: Behind the ramparts, quiet during this period and far from paid car parks and the space dedicated to CCs where everyone is crowded together. Super quiet night.

title: (2580) Merceana - Rua dos Bombeiros Voluntários

title: (2510) Gaeiras - IP6

Water, tables, artisanal barbecue (provide grill). Easy access. Proximity to Obidos. There are some spaces to park also between trees for a sprinter. Bit of noise from the highway. Mountain bike singletrack trails within 5 minutes on the smaller dirt tracks down towards the barragem.

title: (2510-135) Óbidos - 8 Rua Dom João V

title: (2580) - Rua das Carreiras
description: Parking above the village of Ota, beautiful 180 ° view, many picnic tables, a barbecue area and several water taps (2/3 of closed at this time). Ideal for a quiet alte quiet.

title: (2580) - 1 Largo Doutor Mário Madeira

title: (2530) Lourinhã - 3 Rua Principal

title: (2040-481) Asseiceira -

title: (2530-059) Lourinhã - 25 Rua Vale dos Dinossauros

title: () Óbidos Municipality - IC1

title: (2040) Rio Maior - R. Principal
description: Slightly sloping parking lot, lots of space, quiet but hum of wind turbines following the wind.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - 69 Estrada das Salinas
description:
Salinas de Rio Maior. Large gravel car park almost flat. 100m from the village, the saltworks and the shops. Very quiet night despite the proximity of the road, but not very busy at night.
Very typical village with its wooden houses and its very rare "terrestrial" saltworks. I also recommend the Solar do Sal Restaurant and its excellent Portuguese-style chicken at very moderate prices in a beautiful rustic setting. The owner is very friendly and speaks French. I recommend

title: (2510) Óbidos - Unnamed Road
description: Parking slightly set back from a quiet road. Departure from Ecovia tracks for Obidos or for the lagoon.

name: HERDADE DA HERA
title: (2065) HERDADE DA HERA
description:
Herdade da Hera:
Tourism and leisure area. Farm animals, organic gardens, comun kitchen and living room... Our door is closed because the animals are loose on the place. You have a doorbell on the gate. Wish you a wonderful trip!

title: (2530-010) Atalaia - 13 Estrada Nossa Senhora da Guia
title_short: (2530-010) Atalaia - 13 Estrada Nossa Senhora da Guia
description: Toilets found very clean, certainly maintained by the parish or the commune. water point outside (not specified if drinkable but I suppose so). Small car park opposite the church, just behind, in the center of the village

title_short: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 28 Rua José Francisco de Sousa

We arrived at the last minute and there was hardly anyone else. Recommended if you are in the Park and looking for a place to spend the night.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - IC2
description: GasProCar Gasstation. Possibility to get foreign gas bottles filled. Filled our german bottle without problems.

title: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 21 N360
description: Baleia verde - very nice car wash

Parking lot, near to the beach.

title: (2530) Lourinhã - Largo da Foz
description: Parking of the Praia da Areia Branca. Motorhome and vans tolerated at the bottom of the car park, along the wall of the campsite. When vendors fold the stands, there are still more places. Quiet night, no services.

title: (2530-065) Lourinhã - 70 Estrada do Areal
description: Nice parking behind the dunes, ATTENTION the parking has been restricted, not suitable for large motorhomes, in the low season it is great, in the high season I don't know.

title: (2510) Vau - EM573
description: Nice place near a restaurant ideal for the night. Near the calm sea.

title: (2580) Alenquer - N9
description: At the edge of the road but quiet, table and barbecue, very good inexpensive restaurant, friendly and French-speaker.

title: (2510) Óbidos -
description: A clean and beautiful picnic area that is accessed by a wooden bridge located 40 meters from the place to sleep. Space for 4 vans on the banks of a peaceful and calm estuary. Lots of mosquitoes. Forbidden to leave toilet paper or any other trace of having passed ppr here. If you have poop, take it in a bag.

title: (2530) Atalaia de Cima - 75 Estrada Porto das Barcas
title_short: (2530) Atalaia de Cima - 75 Estrada Porto das Barcas
description: Perfect for day and night !!.. Very quiet and rough sea, spectacular!

title: (2510) Amoreira - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet night near the pontoon at the bottom of the restaurant (WiFi) which opens at 10am. Some passages until 8 p.m. of walkers. The restaurant is closed from 3 p.m. so no discomfort in the evening.

title: (2560) Torres Vedras - R. São Gonçalo de Lagos
title_short: (2560) Torres Vedras - R. São Gonçalo de Lagos
description: Large gravelled car park. No motorhome ban. No service. Calm aspect during the day. Lots of parked cars. Easy access even to large vehicles.

title: (2580) Alenquer - 2 Rua Serpa Pinto
description: Small flat parking area next to a derelict morgue.  100m away from the road. 10 min walk into the village with shops, restaurants and cafe’s.

title: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 3 Rua Professor José Lalanda Ribeiro
title_short: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 3 Rua Professor José Lalanda Ribeiro
description: Good place to stay overnight

title: (2530) Atalaia - 58 Portal da peralta
description: Facing Peralta beach. Slightly silted up in winter but a few places on bitumen remain available. Faucet nearby and toilets open in summer. Camping forbidden

title: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 2 Rua Pereira Brazão
title_short: (2500) Caldas da Rainha - 2 Rua Pereira Brazão
description: Continent Parking. I have spent one night here with no problems.

name: Le Jasmin Etoilé
title: (2070-352) Le Jasmin Etoilé
description: 2-3 places for camper or caravan. Water, electricity, cassette and gray water evacuation, sink. Shops nearby: grocery store, fruit and vegetables, bar. Once a week: butcher and fishmonger. Cash machine. Pets accepted. If booking a minimum of one week, we take you to the supermarket for free for your purchases. Possibility to rent a kitchen tent with two pieces of furniture and an induction hob for a minimum of one week.

title: (2560-280) Torres Vedras - 6A Rua Luís Augusto Albino
title_short: (2560-280) Torres Vedras - 6A Rua Luís Augusto Albino
description: Nice place to wash clothes, there are parking lots in front where you can park your van

title: (2530) Atalaia - 27 Rua Vale Bravo
description: The dirt road that leads to the beach: praia de paralta separates into two parts, take the one on the left. a long steep descent will give you access to a superb panorama from the top of the cliff. two places to sleep. quiet. no shade or services. just below some small houses. quiet sleep and beautiful view.

title: (2560) Torres Vedras - Barro
description: Very good and quiet park. Next to the Expotorres. There are no services, there is a bar and other shopping areas around. A 5-minute walk from the City Center. Great for visiting the city, the Castle and other attractions. Very good to park during Carnival. Great park area near Expotorres. No services. Only parking. Quiet and near by the town center, 5 minutes walk.

title: (2500-568) Nadadouro -
description: Quiet place to spend a night / day

title: (2500) Nadadouro -
description: It's a great place with a beautiful view of the water, I parked my valve on the lawn and I was able to sleep in peace

title: (2560-295) Torres Vedras - 1 Rua António Augusto Cabral
title_short: (2560-295) Torres Vedras - 1 Rua António Augusto Cabral
description: Quiet parking in the limits of a small city called Torres Vedras, no need to pay, but not a place where you can bring your table and chairs

title: (2530) Ribamar - 3 Beco dos Venturas
description:
We found this spot through Google maps. It is a park for caravans overlooking the ocean. It was just us here but it can take more than 10 vehicles. 
Just need to be careful not to park near the edges as it is located on top of a cliff.
Very quiet and peaceful place to stay the night.

title: (2560-683) Torres Vedras - Rua Villenave d`Ornon
description: Good and quiet park to stay the night or the day, next to the firemen and the police. Only parking, without services. Great to walk in the city. Very good to park during carnival.

title: (2530) Ribamar - 3 Beco dos Venturas
description: Awesome parking on the seaside, end of the road, restaurants within walking distance. Wc and beach shower. And this evening, the sunset is admirable ...

title: (2500-303) Caldas da Rainha - 32 Rua da Palhagueira
title_short: (2500-303) Caldas da Rainha - 32 Rua da Palhagueira
description: Car wash, at the end there is a place for high vehicles, perfect for camper vans!

title: (2510) - Unnamed Road
description: At the edge Bras de l'Océan. Very nice view and extremely quiet. After the restaurant follow the path for about 2 kms.

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - Lagoa de Óbidos
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - Lagoa de Óbidos
description: Take a dirt road from the roadside parking lot which leads to a small beach facing the lagoon. We meet some fishermen. Quiet place

title: (2510-662) - Unnamed Road
description: Access possible by camper even nasturtium, super spot in nature

title: (2525-520) Atouguia da Baleia - 41 Rua do Caldeirão
title_short: (2525-520) Atouguia da Baleia - 41 Rua do Caldeirão
description: Washing with clean and functioning lances, campers allowed but not over 6mt

title: (2500) Nadadouro - Lagoa de Óbidos
description: Just next to the other place in the wilderness, you have to get back on the road before taking a small sandix road accessible to all types of vehicles. Be careful though if it is wet, a small hill could be a problem to leave the next day. Great views of the lagoon, under the trees where to lay lots of hammocks!

title: (2580) Sobral de Monte Agraço - 3 Estrada de Pereira Palhacana
title_short: (2580) Sobral de Monte Agraço - 3 Estrada de Pereira Palhacana
description: Large car park at the end of the village, equipped with clean toilets, running water, abandoned picnic area, usable barbecue, sink with water, outside water tap which allowed to fill with water. However no possibility of emptying the wastewater. The village bar makes groceries

title: (2530) Ribamar - 3 Caminho dos Bolineiros do Mar
title_short: (2530) Ribamar - 3 Caminho dos Bolineiros do Mar
description: Space for 2 mobile homes. Very quiet and a descent to a beautiful quiet beach available.

title: (2560) Torres Vedras - Barro
description: Municipal Motorhome Parking very well located with all services for free, no reserved parking spaces, you can park on any spot, nice green park and dog park just in front, all connected via a cycling lane, many supermarkets and a fast-food around the corner.

title: (2530-656) Ribamar - 6 Estrada da Cardinha
description: Great and quiet place to sleep. We stayed here for one night with 4 other campers. There is enough space for 3 mobile homes and 2 smaller cars. There is a steep and narrow path to the beach (we managed it easily with a 4 year old) or a 10 minute flight of stairs. Proper bathing is only possible at low tide due to the high waves. Nevertheless, a very nice beach that is not overcrowded.

title: (2580-523) Alenquer -
description: Large clean and quiet parking two taps a few trash cans

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - Unnamed Road
description: Small, flat location a few meters from Vale Pombas beach

title: (2510) Casalinho - 1 Rua da Nau
description: Beautiful and quiet location by the lake. Easy to access via an unpaved road, including for motorhomes.

title: (2510-662) - Unnamed Road
description: Splendid place with a superb view and surrounded by nature. You will be here at the foot of the water with beautiful trees for more privacy. There is a track for this walk or bike ride. Thank you for respecting the places and taking your waste as you knew the brought.

title: (2510) Óbidos - Rua da Nau
description: Parking at lagoon. Overnight possible. No facilities. Boarding place for kitesurfing and kite surfing lessons. Access road last part is paved dirt road.

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - Rua da Barragem
title_short: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - Rua da Barragem
description: On an almost-island at the water's edge next to the dam. Not really flat, but quiet and beautiful view. We spent a day and a night there, the village is very close, with a bakery, etc. We feel far from everything, like on an island. Perfect for relaxing

title: (2500) Nadadouro - 160 Rua Engenheiro Luís de Paiva e Sousa
title_short: (2500) Nadadouro - 160 Rua Engenheiro Luís de Paiva e Sousa
description: Small grassy corner under the pines, near picnic area with toilets. View on the lagoon. Road ahead but very busy in the evening, very quiet night.

address.street: 160 Rua Engenheiro Luís de Paiva e Sousa

title: (2510-662) Amoreira - Rua da Nau
description: Parking space by the water. Not a nice beach unfortunately, lots of large pebbles and water plants. A great beach for kite surfing! And a nice view over the bay of Obidos!

title: (2525) Ferrel - Estrada dos Casais
description: Picnic area , next to a gas station

title: (2560) - Estrada do Hotel Golf Mar
description: Small Camping spot on the Coastline with a great view. Not too exposed and quiet in the night. Narrow trails along the Coastline are perfectly suitable for mountainbiking. Approach over "Estr. Do Hotel Golf Mar"

title: (2500-303) Caldas da Rainha - 76 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
title_short: (2500-303) Caldas da Rainha - 76 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
description: To wash the motorhome a ramp

title: (2565-206) Dois Portos - 67 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Cosy outdoor kitchen with picknick tables, fireplace and a sink combined. toilet as well.

title: (2040-460) São João da Ribeira - 2 Rua Francisco Farelo
title_short: (2040-460) São João da Ribeira - 2 Rua Francisco Farelo
description: Drinking water next to the fountain.

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia -
description: Nice place to sleep overlooking the sea! Over dirt road!

title: (2520) Ferrel - Unnamed Road
description:
Just after a pic nic area , already two vans parked in there so we went a little bit more inside the forest.
nice acess , no police, near a gas station...it's  a hunt area but we didn't even heard nothing , just 3 cars passed during the day while we were resting 
....and several places were to chose

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - Rua dos Moinhos
title_short: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - Rua dos Moinhos
description: Super nice location on the cliffs at the end of a path! You have a wonderful view of the sea and towards Peniche. I've stood in the field several times, always without problems. Please take the trash with you!

title: (2565) Dois Portos - 56 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Fountain with water. Canisters have a lot of space, the water jet is also so that they can be filled quickly. And a small nice café next door.

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - 5 Rua de São Domingos
title_short: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - 5 Rua de São Domingos
description: Picnic area with benches and drinking water fountain

name: Lagoa de Óbidos
title: (2510) Lagoa de Óbidos
description: Small parking at the beginning of a footpath or mountain bike. Shady. Nice view of the lagoon. A trash can available. No service. Bad side for the sunset. No prohibition sign. Attention agitated night because background music in the distance that disturbs the tranquility ...

title: () Caldas da Rainha - 77 Estrada Nacional 8
description: LPG gas. Very very cheap! And a lovely owner. It’s at the back of the warehouses so don’t be put off!

title: (2560) Torres Vedras - 100 Rua Francisco Pombo Sobrinho
title_short: (2560) Torres Vedras - 100 Rua Francisco Pombo Sobrinho
description: Rest place with picnic tables

title: (2560) - Avenida Doutor Joaquim Jacinto
description: Great place for parking near the beach

title: (2525-760) Atouguia da Baleia - 28 Rua da Praia
title_short: (2525-760) Atouguia da Baleia - 28 Rua da Praia
description: It has public bathrooms with a closed shower down the stairs that lead to the beach.

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 41 Avenida Doutor Joaquim Jacinto
title_short: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 41 Avenida Doutor Joaquim Jacinto
description: Parking facing the sea with cars, direct access to the beach

title: (2510) Vau - Poça Pequena
description: Parking directly on the beach. In the evening and in the morning a few fishermen are there with their cars. Kitespot directly on site. You should not drive too far, the water can come in the flat part almost to the crossing bike path.

title: (2475) Benedita - 20 Rua do Lapeirão
description: Large park, for travelers, truckers to park for rest or sleep. Restaurant / cafe open 24/24, with WC and free shower for guests. The property has a bakery. The park has charging stations for electric cars (Tesla and communes).

title: () Sobral de Monte Agraço - N248
description: Nice little park, trees for shade, quiet, water, barbecue grill, tables, near a supermarket, a little sloped.

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Encosta do Reivas
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Encosta do Reivas
description: Hardly parking, without services. quiet day and night

title: (2520) Ferrel - 2 Travessa da Amizade
description: Free water! Yeah! Tastes fantástico and good flowspeed.

title: (2520) Ferrel - 29 Rua da Saudade
description: Laundromat Pink Bubbles. Washing machines 10-27 kg , dryers 17-22 kg . Detergent and disinfection are included, payment only with cash. There is also WiFi, a snack vending machine and a washing and ironing service.

title: (2560) Ponte do Rol - 60 Rua Estudante Circular
title_short: (2560) Ponte do Rol - 60 Rua Estudante Circular

title: (2560) Ponte do Rol - 69 N9
description: perfect quiet little spot with a river surrounded by a pear tree orchard. You can go by camper and park on some grass next to the road at the bridge where you can walk across to the town where there is a play park for kids.  very quiet and peaceful. No facilities. if you are into hiking there is a trail here too.

title: (2520-128) Ferrel - 14 Rua da Paz
description: Water tap. Lots of pressure. Works great!

title: (2590) Sobral de Monte Agraço - 15 Campo da Feira
title_short: (2590) Sobral de Monte Agraço - 15 Campo da Feira
description: New area, all facilities. At the weekend you should not stay overnight because of the adjacent disco.

name: Parque de Campismo Orbitur Foz de Arelho.
title: (2500) Parque de Campismo Orbitur Foz de Arelho.
title_short: (2500) Parque de Campismo Orbitur Foz de Arelho.
description: Camping site near the Lagoon. 3 min by car. with pool and bar. Lovely camping Place for tents. Electricity 4 euro. 2 adults and 1 car around 23 euro

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - Lagoa de Óbidos
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - Lagoa de Óbidos
description: Small parking lot right on the lagoon of Foz do Arelho.

title: (2510-451) Amoreira - 10 Avenida Dom Pedro Primeiro
description: Very large parking with no height limit on the beach itself. I have arrived late in the afternoon, people leave after spending the day on the beach. I intend to sleep here. There are no prohibition plates.

title: (2070-397) Pontével - 13 Largo do Rio da Fonte
title_short: (2070-397) Pontével - 13 Largo do Rio da Fonte
description:
Maintenance area next to the Pontével river beach.
Temporarily unavailable due to the annual festivities ending 05/09/2023, one week after the end of the festivities it should be available.

title: (2510) Leiria - 3 EM573
description: Ample parking also for long campers. there is the autocarros sign but no prohibition. spent a quiet night and a beautiful day at the beach. public toilets, beach showers and restaurants just below

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia -
description: Small, slightly sloping car park, park just before the car park in the grass. access from the bottom of the other car park already listed. we spent a very calm night with the added bonus of a beautiful sunset.

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - Praia do Seixo
title_short: (2560) A dos Cunhados - Praia do Seixo
description: Very quiet place between the pines with many places (more than 10 in my opinion). During the day there are a lot of people who come to eat under the pines but it remains very calm, at the end of the afternoon everyone leaves, we were 2 vans and 1 motorhome. Accessible for all types of vehicles, in the area you will not find anything better, especially when it comes to shelter from the wind !! ;)

title: (2510-661) Distrito de Leiria - 2 EM573
description: Showers and drinking water

title: () A dos Cunhados - Rua da Colónia
title_short: () A dos Cunhados - Rua da Colónia
description: A small but super private parking spot with an easy access to the beach, great view and organic farm in a 5 minute walk.

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - 19 Rua Moderna
description: Free camping car park with facilities (clean water suply, and grey and black water discharge). At the entrance of village and about 800 m from beach. Has a lot of parking places (about 30). The ground is dirt and more or less level.

title: (2475-150) Benedita - 207 Rua da Fábrica da Sola
title_short: (2475-150) Benedita - 207 Rua da Fábrica da Sola
description: Flat parking, in the parking lot of the municipal swimming pool. Calm at night. On Saturday evening some young people, but without problem.

title: (2520-133) Ferrel - 30 Rua da Quintinha
description: Very Nice self service laundry

title: (2510) - Unnamed Road
description: Nice and small nature spot overlooking two beaches. Super quiet, even during day almost no people around. Parking spot is not completely flat.

title: (2510) Amoreira - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful spot! I stayed here for one night and was pretty much alone. Everybody has a chance to stand on the way. Please pay attention to nature and only on the sandy paths! Please take your rubbish with you!

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - 2 Rua Doutor Raquel Ribeiro
title_short: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - 2 Rua Doutor Raquel Ribeiro
description: Parking next to the area, when it's full on weekends it's a good option, there are no services, very quiet, there were more motorhomes. Beach for surfing at 600m.

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - N247
description: Location rather isolated on the heights of the cliffs with access to a low-frequented beach. splendid landscape. source a few meters from the camp

title: (2520) Ferrel -
description: Wonderful place to swim in surf and take a nap

title: (2525-553) Atouguia da Baleia - 18 N114
description: LPG station

title: (2475-126) Benedita - 23 Rua 16 de Maio
description: Only vehicles up to 3500kg.  Free parking spaces on a tree-lined road.  Adjacent to a beautiful children's playground, small square, garden with benches.  On the other side of the gas station self-service washing machines with free wifi.  At 5 minutes walking distance from the center.

title: (2560) Ponte do Rol - 5 Rua das Adegas
title_short: (2560) Ponte do Rol - 5 Rua das Adegas
description: Village of very nice people and with very economic services. You can sleep in any of its streets. In the location there is a pastry shop in the area that is worth spending

title: (2500-303) Caldas da Rainha - 8 Estrada Nacional 8
description:
A parking lot in front of the Igreja de Nossa Senhora da Anunciação de Tornada.
Excellent location, despite being next to N8.
Very close to Paul da Tornada, a nature reserve.
I recommend a visit.
In the roundabouts there are cafes, bars and restaurants.

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - Largo Francisco Sá Carneiro - Lagoa de Óbidos
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - Largo Francisco Sá Carneiro - Lagoa de Óbidos
description: Parking space for mobile homes with all facilities available. Located right on the lagoon. Places without electricity are common. The sanitary building is open during the day from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. The toilet block also contains 1 cold shower and 1 hot shower (keys for hot showers at the reception). Washing area with cold water, emptying of gray and black water and rubbish point is included in the price. The car park itself is well maintained with semi-paved areas (pebbles), some with shade. Many Portuguese who have been there for a long time, all very friendly. Bread is available in the morning from 8:00 in the Marisol bar, 100 m from the campsite. There are also many restaurants along the water.

address.street: Largo Francisco Sá Carneiro - Lagoa de Óbidos

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - 25 Rua Viola
description: Parking overlooking village and sea

title: (2560-135) Ponte do Rol - 15 Largo Alvaro da Ponte
title_short: (2560-135) Ponte do Rol - 15 Largo Alvaro da Ponte
description: Drinking water tap next to road, Good access, water tap can be connected to hose

name: Parque de Campismo Urban Art Camping, Grupo Campigir

title_short: (2520-102) Parque de Campismo Urban Art Camping, Grupo Campigir

title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 43 Rua Francisco Almeida Grandela

title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 45 Rua Joaquim Frutuoso

title_short: (2525-445) Atouguia da Baleia - 88 Avenida da Praia

title: (2510) Praia do rei curtiÇo - Unnamed Road
title_short: (2510) Praia do rei curtiÇo - Unnamed Road
description: Praia do rei curtiÇo (kork king beach) large car park ... a little steep ... 2 flat places at the top.

title: (2580) Carregado - Quinta de Alconchel
description: Intermarché supermarket of ​​Carregado (on EN 1 between Alenquer and Vila Franca de Xira (Portugal). Ask water lock key (free use) at fuel station nearby.

title: (2520) Ferrel -
description: Accès facile piste dure en voiture et van, plusieurs emplacements mais vite complet avec magnifique vue sur la mer. Plage de surfeurs. Pas de services. Beau paysage de falaises rouge et ocre et criques.

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 6B Rua da Oliveirinha
title_short: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 6B Rua da Oliveirinha
description:
Beach car park on top of a big cliff. Overlooking a beautiful beach with big waves. 
Drive past big green houses to get there.. But guess with all the sea breeze and staying only one night yiu won't get diseased permanently by the pesticides..

title: (2040) Malaqueijo - 17 Rua dos Combatentes do Ultramar
title_short: (2040) Malaqueijo - 17 Rua dos Combatentes do Ultramar
description: Picnic area in the village next to a cafe and a playground for small children. Place is under trees.

title: (2500-500) Foz do Arelho - 42 N360
description: Laundry self service. Some shops nearby.

title: (2500-483) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Monte do Facho
title_short: (2500-483) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Monte do Facho
description: Dead end street. we can put a motorhome 6m.

title: (2500-303) Caldas da Rainha - N8
description: Water tap and picnic table.

title: (2560) Santa Cruz - 20 Rua A-Ver-O-Mar
description: Above the cliff, quiet parking because no beach in the immediate vicinity, a little north another parking lot at the end of a track with excellent toilets, but less view. South of Santal Cruz, 2 car parks at the top of the cliffs. Very fun mountain biking from the car park to St Rita via the paragliding spot and plenty of parkings in the countryside.

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Visconde Morais
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Visconde Morais
description: Good usable space in the off-season. In high season you can shower here in cabins or outside in the open air (both free of charge) don't know if the showers are also open in low season.

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 30 Rua A-Ver-O-Mar
description: Point to see the sea and the Berlenga island.

title: (2565-814) - 1 Travessa da Casa Paroquial
description: Rest stop with a free park next to the main church. Space is a little tight for large motorhomes.

title: (2040) - Rua dos Potes Mouros
description: Follow signs '' formacao prismaticos basalticos ''. Spot with beautiful view of the serra, very very quiet, at the foot of the volcanic rock with natural water source 50m before, and small lake hidden 200m. Shady all morning! Gravel road very passable!

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 45 Rua do Sol
title_short: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 45 Rua do Sol
description:
We offer space for campervans & motorhomes in a natural, peaceful and silent environment. We respect people, animals and nature.

At Lugar do Sol we live in an ecological, sustainable and self-sufficient way, energy comes from the sun, water comes from our well, we have a biological garden and we produce cosmetics and natural detergents.

In the shared areas, there is: a dry bathroom with hot shower, shared kitchen, our biological garden, a small swimming pool that delights the kids and adults, an area for the little ones and all the space to disconnect from everyday life, relax and meditate.

We have 3 dogs, chickens, ducks, fishes, frogs etc. and more animals are welcome.

Equipment available for fun: surfboard, bikes and tools for minor repairs. 

We also have a caravan and a small sustainable house available for rent. Built with recycled glass bottles, straw, lime, old wood and lots of love.)

Contact us if you want to know more about our projects and how you can participate.

Please contact in advance to confirm availability.

To find us follow the GPS and look for a Bambu gate.

We have special prices for long stays!

Enjoy!
